word: THE CLOSING CHAPTER, "THE LAST MESSAGES TO THE GENERAL CONFERENCE," REPRESENTS THE TWO FORMAL STATEMENTS MRS. WHITE PREPARED AND SENT TO BE READ AT THE GENERAL CONFERENCE IN SESSION IN 1913--THE LAST HELD WHILE SHE LIVED. EXCERPTS FROM THESE TWO MESSAGES HAVE APPEARED ELSEWHERE IN PRINT. IT SEEMS APPROPRIATE THAT THE FULL STATEMENTS SHOULD BE INCLUDED HERE, INDICATING, AS THEY DO, MRS. WHITE'S CONFIDENCE IN THE LEADERS OF THE CHURCH AND ITS FINAL TRIUMPH.--WHITE TRUSTEES.
